definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: In that night was Belshazzar the king of the Chaldeans slain.
sentences.chinese: 當夜，迦勒底王伯沙撒被殺。

sentences.english: There were several alarms during the night but no actual air raid took place.
sentences.chinese: 當夜，空襲警報拉響了數次，但並沒有飛機來襲。

sentences.english: Or, it actually happened the night before!
sentences.chinese: 或當夜該航班墜機實際發生。

sentences.english: With dark shies you will notice the reddish color of Arcturus.
sentences.chinese: 當夜幕降臨時，你會注意到那顆淡紅色的大角星。

sentences.english: That night the house detective raided alec's hotel room.
sentences.chinese: 當夜，偵探搜查了亞歷克在旅館的房間。

sentences.english: That night (27 -28 June) defensive works were thrown up in selected places near Berestko.
sentences.chinese: 當夜，選定在別列斯科奇附近地方建立防禦工事。

sentences.english: "Appeared the same night," the night on which he went to Beer-sheba.
sentences.chinese: 艾薩克上別示巴去，當夜耶和華向他顯現。

sentences.english: That night the 2 men and their company surrendered to Zhao Zilong.
sentences.chinese: 當夜二人引五百軍徑奔趙雲寨來投降。

sentences.english: At that hour of the night the jailer took them and washed their wounds;
sentences.chinese: 當夜就在那時候，禁卒把他們帶去，洗他們的傷。

sentences.english: As dusk fell, we seemed to face an uncertain future.
sentences.chinese: 當夜幕降臨時，我們似乎面對一個不確定的未來。

sentences.english: He plans to dive into that same night by neither incense, rescued peony.
sentences.chinese: 他計劃當夜潛入荷香別院，救走牡丹。

sentences.english: When the darkness falls will you please shine her the way.
sentences.chinese: 當夜幕落下，請你照亮她前面的路。

sentences.english: The same night Baltasar the Chaldean king was slain.
sentences.chinese: 當夜加色丁王貝耳沙匝即爲人所殺。

sentences.english: Nightfalll found him many miles short of his destination.
sentences.chinese: 當夜幕降臨時，他離目的地還有好幾英里呢。

sentences.english: As dusk fell, he decided to return to Shepperton.
sentences.chinese: 當夜幕降臨時，他決定返回謝伯頓。
